name: Space Shooter (itch) (SA Panday)
description:
This game was made for an assignment in my coding class 

HOW TO PLAY

Move: wasd or the arrow keys

Shoot: left click

Other stuff

use the barriers they can only take a few hits until they break. The Aliens don't take dying lightly and will shoot back at you so be careful, also just don't be bad and then you'll be good!
